data.eml:eml: Bees of the genus Lasioglossum (Hymenoptera: Halictidae) from Greater Puerto Rico, West Indies

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gibbs, Jason (2018): Bees of the genus Lasioglossum (Hymenoptera: Halictidae) from Greater Puerto Rico, West Indies. European Journal of Taxonomy 400: 1-57, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.400
